name: MeltDown (itch) (HO-Nemises)
description:
Escape the confines of your sterile containment chamber by Destroying All that try to Shut you Down!

Charge up the objects nearby with your radioactive powers, and unleash them on those that would dare to stop your... MeltDown!

Features:

  • 2 difficulty levels
  • 2 Unique levels (more to come)
  • Multiple ways to use your environment to gain your Ultimate Freedom !
